section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on September 18, 2024.*
section.heading: Applicability of authority of Mayor to issue marriage licenses.
section.text: The authority of the Mayor under [§§ 46-401 through 46-415.01 ] to issue marriage licenses and authorize officiants shall apply only during a period of time when the Clerk of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia is not issuing marriage licenses because of a total or partial federal government shutdown.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2(f) of Let Our Vows Endure (LOVE) Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-296, Nov. 15, 2023, 70 DCR 15226).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 2(f) of Let Our Vows Endure (LOVE) Temporary Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Law 25-117, Feb. 6, 2024, 70 DCR 15726).
